task.name: hif_transformimagedata
task.shortdescription: Extract fields for the desired VLASS image to a new MS and reset weights if desired
task.description:
Extract fields for the desired VLASS image to a new MS and reset weights if desired
Output:
results -- If pipeline mode is 'getinputs' then None is returned. Otherwise the results object for the pipeline task is returned.

param.name: vis
param.description:
List of visibility data files. These may be ASDMs, tar files of ASDMs, MSs, or tar files of MSs, If ASDM files are specified, they will be converted to MS format.
example: vis=['X227.ms', 'asdms.tar.gz']

param.name: field
param.shortdescription: Set of data selection field names or ids, \'\' for all
param.description: Set of data selection field names or ids, \'\' for all.

param.name: intent
param.shortdescription: Set of data selection intents, \'\' for all
param.description: Set of data selection intents, \'\' for all.

param.name: spw
param.shortdescription: Set of data selection spectral window ids \'\' for all
param.description: Set of data selection spectral window ids \'\' for all.

param.name: datacolumn
param.description:
Select spectral windows to split. The standard CASA options are supported
example: 'data', 'model'

param.name: chanbin
param.shortdescription: Channel bin width for spectral averaging

param.name: replace
param.shortdescription: Remove the parent MS and replace with the split MS
param.description:
If a split was performed delete the parent MS and remove it from the context.
example: True or False

param.name: wtmode
param.description: optional weight initialization mode when modify_weights=True

param.name: pipelinemode
param.description: The pipeline operating mode. In 'automatic' mode the pipeline determines the values of all context defined pipeline inputs automatically. In 'interactive' mode the user can set the pipeline context defined parameters manually. In 'getinputs' mode the user can check the settings of all pipeline parameters without running the task.

param.name: dryrun
param.shortdescription: Run the task (False) or display the command(True)
param.description: Run the commands (True) or generate the commands to be run but do not execute (False).

param.name: acceptresults
param.shortdescription: Add the results to the pipeline context
param.description: Add the results of the task to the pipeline context (True) or reject them (False).
